content.rendered:
Directed by Shekhar Sirrinn.

Written by Shekhar Sirrinn.

Cast Natalia Janoszek(Maya Johnson). Ashutosh Rana(Sitapati Shukla). Makrand Deshpande(Mutthu Swamy). Nivedita Bhattacharya(Satya Deshmukh). Mukesh Hariawala(Bar Owner). Zakir Hussain(Sharad Joshi). Aman Verma(Chagan Patil) . Parthaa Akerkar(Pandey). Sania Choudhury(Laachi). Atul Dabang(Dwarf). Anushree Junnarkar(Soni). Parvez Khan(Salim Bhai). Firdaus Mevawala(Judge). Nikhil(Tambi). Ganesh Pai(Makrand Joshi – Makiya). Ravi Paliwal(News Cameraman). Anuragh Pandey(Radio Jockey). Gulshan Pandey(Commissioner (as Gulsan Pandey)). Ankita Pareek(Maya Roommate). Devanand Pasvan(Dadda). Payal(News Reader). Rakesh Ranjan(P. A). Pramod Saini(Security Guard). Aishwarya Sharma(Female Reporter). Annirudh Sharma(Nana). Niharika Shekhar(Meera). Amol Soni(Muttu Assistant). Ananya Soni(News Reporter). Anaya Soni(Reporter). Hiten Tank(Dinu). Jaywant Wadkar(Inspector Waghley). Jitendra Yadav(Ghanshyam)

Language Hindi.

Producers Jagdish Dharma Dhalpe. Shankar K.N.. Shankar KN. Amit Kumar. Sukhdev Singh.

Production Seven Hillss Cine Creations.
